Charles Center builds on the significant features of Downtown, accent-
ing the positive. Downtown Baltimore, in spite of its deterioration,
has magnificent advantages in physical topography, central location,
and architecturally and functionally significant features which are the

SIGNIFICANT FEATURES OF THE CENTRAL BUSINESS DISTRICT
